subject: Learning
title: Episodic Memory: Your Personal Timeline
description: A 60-second lesson on Episodic Memory: Your Personal Timeline.

hook.text: Close your eyes and recall your last birthday. You can almost see it, hear it, feel it.

buildup.text: That's episodic memoryâ€”personal experiences stamped with time and place.

discovery.text: Episodic memories are rich: they bundle sights, sounds, emotions, and context together.

twist.text: But they're also the most fragile. Each recall subtly rewrites the original.

climax.text: The memory of your birthday isn't a recording. It's a reconstruction that shifts each time.

punchline.text: Every time you remember, you rewrite.

quiz.question: What makes episodic memory unique?
options: It stores personal experiences with time and place
